actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to suspend until the close of June 30, 1980, certain duties on calcined petroleum coke not commercially suitable for use as a fuel.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend through June 30, 1980, the customs duties on calcinated petroleum coke, not commercially suitable for use as fuel.

titles.title: A bill to suspend until the close of June 30, 1980, certain duties on calcined petroleum coke not commercially suitable for use as a fuel.
